flawed_nl_solution:
Tom needs to pass for 6000 - 4200 = <<6000-4200=8100>>8100 yards to beat the record.
Therefore, he needs to average 8100 yards / 6 games = <<8100/6=1350>>1350 yards per game.
#### 1350

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1800, not 8100. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
